resources.string: Interview Quiz
ENTER NAME
ENTER EMAIL
There are no correct answers. Your response will allow us to match you to the best position we can offer.
1. How far along are you in your career today?
I am starting from the beginning without any experience to offer
I have much experience but there is quite a bit of learning on the road ahead
I have much experience and will be leading rather than following
2. In your daily experience, how would you describe your feelings about the choices you make?
I am happy with the choices I make and would not make them any differently
I try to make the best decision at each opportunity but find I can learn and do better
I often regret my daily choices
3. Your office is on the third floor, will you take the stairs or the elevator?
Stairs
Elevator
I will make a decision each day according to the circumstances
4. You are a few meters from the train platform and the doors are about to close, you:
Sprint like hell
Walk fast and bang on the doors hoping the conductor will open
Miss the train and wait for the next one
Submit Answer
Restart Quiz
You are faced with adversity in your personal life, you:
Ask for advice before acting
Do yoga, breathe and move on
React as you see fit at the moment
Score results for
"Thank you for taking the time to complete the quiz!\nWe will be in touch with you to discuss the results further. "
